titleStmt.title: An elegy on the reverend and learned divine, Dr. Lazarus Seaman, sometime vice-chancellour of Cambridg, master of Peter-House, and late minister of the Gospel in Alhallows-Bread Street.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "WHat Seaman dead? and did no Blazing Star ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
